Tartarus

Job Interview II

19 Mar 2018

Today was the first time I have worn a suit in the last 2 and a bit years, funnily enough the last time was when the same company I interviewed at today previously offered me a job.

I kinda hate people in suits, but wearing one also made me feel weirdly confident.

I feel like the interview went well, he seemed positive overall, but I don't want to get my hopes up. I'll find out on Monday.
